alert.note: Alert for Fort Peck Reservation and Daniels, Roosevelt, Sheridan Counties (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 12 at 5:29PM MDT until September 12 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY/ERRATIC WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 120... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 120 which includes Fort Peck Reservation and Daniels/Roosevelt/Sheridan Counties. * TIMING...This afternoon and early evening. * WINDS...North 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * HIGH TEMPERATURES...In the 80s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Fort Peck Reservation and Daniels, Roosevelt, Sheridan Counties
